ModMetaData.description:
Druid-like aspects mod for RimWorld.
- Alerts for all downed animals - Animal Lover Trait: +2 animals and can detect animals that are down - Loner Trait: A isolated individual and enjoys working on their own.
Updates: 1.1.0.2 - New Loner Trait - New dependency: Harmony
